item.description:
We're heading over the river but not through the woods, to drink, to possibly eat and to definitely be merry.

The Idea(l) Man, Leo, says we should check out Miercoles de Cantina at Conga Bar & Restaurant in Harvard Square. Andres, Carlos and Omar will perform the songs of Soda Estereo, Gipsy Kings, Pablo Milanes, Reik, Fonseca, Vicente Fernandez and Zoe.

Conga is the ideal setting because we can dine on tapas, sip on sangria and enjoy musica. Of course you do have the option to drink the beverage of your choice or not dine or not stay around for the music.

Here's the plan:

6 PM Begin drinking and/or dining but most importantly hanging out with friendly folks

9 PM La m√∫sica empieza

Feel free to arrive when you can and leave when you must but everyone must maintain their own tab or pay as you they order.
item.name: Drink or Eat or Music, A You Choose Which; Happy Good Time
